title: Grand Finale Mission OPL Stream not found

embed.description: Feed your competitive spirit as we bring you the best that professional League of Legends has to offer.

body:
Currently I am unable to complete this grand final mission atm
The VOD on the LoLesports website it says  "NO STREAMS FOUND FOR CURRENT GAME"

this is the sad case for many many OPL games on the website BUT it makes a difference here as this mission requires you to watch specifically this match. With only 6 days left to complete this mission.. the clock is ticking

Please and Thankyou rito

replies.body: The VODs are up now, it often takes a day or two for the recordings to be available.

Fair enough, good things come to those who wait

can't stress how happy I am though that I'm back from camping in time to complete the mission
:) :) :)

And late enough you missed the drama with them being broken for a bit :P

GL on the rift :)
Same boat, what's worse is I watched the finals live while logged in and didn't get it either...
